long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily schedule clicks for your window. I developed this extension as a means to submit an upload to a website where scheduling uploads isn't possible. With this extension, you just right click what you want to click, and follow the prompts to set the exact time you would like to preform the click.
